00033 class INET_API TCPAlgorithm : public cPolymorphic
00034 {
00035   protected:
00036     TCPConnection *conn; // we belong to this connection
00037     TCPStateVariables *state; // our state variables
00038 
00045     virtual TCPStateVariables *createStateVariables() = 0;

00047   public:
00051     TCPAlgorithm() {state = NULL; conn = NULL;}

00057 
00062     void setConnection(TCPConnection *_conn) {conn = _conn;}
00063 
00067     TCPStateVariables *getStateVariables() {
00068         if (!state) state = createStateVariables();
00069         return state;
00070     }
